thread.title: Canadiens forward Zack Kassian suffers minor injuries in car crash
thread.title_full: Canadiens forward Zack Kassian suffers minor injuries in car crash

title: Canadiens forward Zack Kassian suffers minor injuries in car crash
text:
Canadiens forward Zack Kassian suffers minor injuries in car crash Story File: Toronto Maple Leafs defenceman Mark Fraser, right, and Montreal Canadiens forward Zack Kassian fight during first period pre-season exhibition NHL hockey action in Toronto on Saturday, September 26, 2015. Kassian was treated for minor injuries in hospital Sunday morning after being involved in a traffic accident. THE CANADIAN PRESS/Darren Calabrese 
MONTREAL - Montreal Canadiens forward Zack Kassian was treated for minor injuries in hospital Sunday morning after being involved in a traffic accident, a team spokesman said. 
Reports said Kassian was not driving the vehicle, which crashed into a tree Sunday morning at about 6 a.m.
